# Pubfuture

## Examples

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="pubfuture"
  data-id="PLACE_HOLDER">
  </amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

**Required:**

`width` + `height` - Required for all `<amp-ad>` units. Specifies the ad size.

`type` - Always set to "pubfuture".

`data-id`: Tag Id.
